segment.source: Set up email access for iOS devices using Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Set up email access for iOS devices using Microsoft Intune

segment.source: Set up email access for iOS devices using Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Set up email access for iOS devices using Microsoft Intune

segment.source: When devices are enrolled with , you can configure the devices so that their users can acess company email.
segment.target: When devices are enrolled with , you can configure the devices so that their users can acess company email.

segment.source: One way to accomplish that for specific device types is to create and deploy an email profile.
segment.target: One way to accomplish that for specific device types is to create and deploy an email profile.

segment.source: Email profiles are a kind of policy that sets up and connects a user’s device to your company email service.
segment.target: Email profiles are a kind of policy that sets up and connects a user’s device to your company email service.

segment.source: Using an email profile makes email access automatic for enrolled devices, which avoids manually having to set up the device and any potential problems that might arise doing so.
segment.target: Using an email profile makes email access automatic for enrolled devices, which avoids manually having to set up the device and any potential problems that might arise doing so.

segment.source: Also, an email profile ensures that all end users are setting up access in the same way and with the same basic settings.
segment.target: Also, an email profile ensures that all end users are setting up access in the same way and with the same basic settings.

segment.source: Goals of this walkthrough
segment.target: Goals of this walkthrough

segment.source: To create and deploy an email profile for iOS devices
segment.target: To create and deploy an email profile for iOS devices

segment.source: To verify that the email profile policy has been applied succesfully
segment.target: To verify that the email profile policy has been applied succesfully

segment.source: What you need before starting this walkthrough
segment.target: What you need before starting this walkthrough

segment.source: An Exchange Server, either on-premises or hosted on Azure as part of your Office/E3 subscription
segment.target: An Exchange Server, either on-premises or hosted on Azure as part of your Office/E3 subscription

segment.source: The host name of your company’s Exchange server.
segment.target: The host name of your company’s Exchange server.

segment.source: This is the fully qualified domain name (FQDN).
segment.target: This is the fully qualified domain name (FQDN).

segment.source: For example, contosodemo55.onmicrosoft.com.
segment.target: For example, contosodemo55.onmicrosoft.com.

segment.source: A user group to deploy the email profile to.
segment.target: A user group to deploy the email profile to.

segment.source: If you completed the Start a Microsoft Intune trial and deploy iOS PIN policy walkthrough, you can use the GroupDemo user group you created for it.
segment.target: If you completed the Start a Microsoft Intune trial and deploy iOS PIN policy walkthrough, you can use the GroupDemo user group you created for it.

segment.source: Enrolled iOS devices to deploy the profile to.
segment.target: Enrolled iOS devices to deploy the profile to.

segment.source: Again, if you completed the Start a Microsoft Intune trial and deploy iOS PIN policy walkthrough, you will have enrolled some iOS devices.
segment.target: Again, if you completed the Start a Microsoft Intune trial and deploy iOS PIN policy walkthrough, you will have enrolled some iOS devices.

segment.source: Steps for creating and deploying an email profile for iOS devices
segment.target: Steps for creating and deploying an email profile for iOS devices

segment.source: For this walkthrough we will be using the hosted Exchange server that comes with an E3 trial subscription.
segment.target: For this walkthrough we will be using the hosted Exchange server that comes with an E3 trial subscription.

segment.source: In the console, click Policy, and then click Add Policy.
segment.target: In the console, click Policy, and then click Add Policy.

segment.source: Email Walkthrough 1
segment.target: Email Walkthrough 1

segment.source: In the Create a New Policy dialog box, expand iOS, select Email Profile, and then click Create Policy.
segment.target: In the Create a New Policy dialog box, expand iOS, select Email Profile, and then click Create Policy.

segment.source: Email Walkthrough 2
segment.target: Email Walkthrough 2

segment.source: On the create policy page, enter a name for the policy, like iOS email profile - user-password, and a description.
segment.target: On the create policy page, enter a name for the policy, like iOS email profile - user-password, and a description.

segment.source: You might have multiple email profiles for different device types and different authentication methods, so you can use the name to show what the profile is for.
segment.target: You might have multiple email profiles for different device types and different authentication methods, so you can use the name to show what the profile is for.

segment.source: Enter the Exchange host name.
segment.target: Enter the Exchange host name.

segment.source: Since we are using the Exchange server hosted on Azure, for hostname we simply input: outlook.office365.com
segment.target: Since we are using the Exchange server hosted on Azure, for hostname we simply input: outlook.office365.com

segment.source: Email Walkthrough 3
segment.target: Email Walkthrough 3

segment.source: Enter the account name that will be shown to users of the device to help them identify the email service.
segment.target: Enter the account name that will be shown to users of the device to help them identify the email service.

segment.source: For example, Contoso Email.
segment.target: For example, Contoso Email.

segment.source: Since we’re using username and password to authenticate the user for the Exchange service, just leave the username and password settings the way they are.
segment.target: Since we’re using username and password to authenticate the user for the Exchange service, just leave the username and password settings the way they are.

segment.source: Adjust the synchronization settings to meet your requirements.
segment.target: Adjust the synchronization settings to meet your requirements.

segment.source: For now, just use the defaults, unless there’s a specific one you want to change.
segment.target: For now, just use the defaults, unless there’s a specific one you want to change.

segment.source: Click Save Policy.
segment.target: Click Save Policy.

segment.source: A dialog box appears asking if you want to deploy the policy now.
segment.target: A dialog box appears asking if you want to deploy the policy now.

segment.source: Click Yes.
segment.target: Click Yes.

segment.source: Email Walkthrough 4
segment.target: Email Walkthrough 4

segment.source: In the window that appears next, select the user group you want to deploy the email profile to, click Add, and then click OK.
segment.target: In the window that appears next, select the user group you want to deploy the email profile to, click Add, and then click OK.

segment.source: Email Walkthrough 5
segment.target: Email Walkthrough 5

segment.source: After you click OK, the policy will start to flow down to enrolled devices in a minute or two.
segment.target: After you click OK, the policy will start to flow down to enrolled devices in a minute or two.

segment.source: Steps to verify that the profile has been successfully applied
segment.target: Steps to verify that the profile has been successfully applied

segment.source: To verify that the profile has been applied, you will need access to one of the devices to which you deployed the email profile.
segment.target: To verify that the profile has been applied, you will need access to one of the devices to which you deployed the email profile.

segment.source: On the iOS device, open the Mail app.
segment.target: On the iOS device, open the Mail app.

segment.source: The app will prompt you for the user’s email username and password.
segment.target: The app will prompt you for the user’s email username and password.

segment.source: Email Walkthrough 6
segment.target: Email Walkthrough 6

segment.source: Enter the username and password for the user’s Exchange email account, and then tap OK.
segment.target: Enter the username and password for the user’s Exchange email account, and then tap OK.

segment.source: The Mail app opens to the Exchange account, and email begins synchronizing to the device.
segment.target: The Mail app opens to the Exchange account, and email begins synchronizing to the device.

segment.source: Email Walkthrough 7
segment.target: Email Walkthrough 7

segment.source: Check the account settings in for the Mail app to make sure the account name is the same one you entered in the email profile (for example, Contoso Mail) and the synchronization settings are set correctly.
segment.target: Check the account settings in for the Mail app to make sure the account name is the same one you entered in the email profile (for example, Contoso Mail) and the synchronization settings are set correctly.

segment.source: Email Walkthrough 8
segment.target: Email Walkthrough 8

segment.source: Email Walkthrough 9
segment.target: Email Walkthrough 9

segment.source: If it appears the email profile hasn’t been automatically applied to the device, you can manually apply the policy using the Company Portal app on the device.
segment.target: If it appears the email profile hasn’t been automatically applied to the device, you can manually apply the policy using the Company Portal app on the device.

segment.source: Open the Company Portal app.
segment.target: Open the Company Portal app.

segment.source: Tap My Devices.
segment.target: Tap My Devices.

segment.source: Tap the name of your device.
segment.target: Tap the name of your device.

segment.source: Email Walkthrough 10
segment.target: Email Walkthrough 10

segment.source: Tap Sync > Check Compliance.
segment.target: Tap Sync > Check Compliance.

segment.source: Email Walkthrough 11
segment.target: Email Walkthrough 11

segment.source: After a few moments the email profile gets applied to the device.
segment.target: After a few moments the email profile gets applied to the device.

segment.source: After that, you can follow the verification steps to make sure the profile was applied correctly.
segment.target: After that, you can follow the verification steps to make sure the profile was applied correctly.

segment.source: More information
segment.target: More information

segment.source: Learn more about email profiles, Configure access to corporate email using email profiles with Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Learn more about email profiles, Configure access to corporate email using email profiles with Microsoft Intune

segment.source: Learn more about policies, Use policies to manage computers and mobile devices with Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Learn more about policies, Use policies to manage computers and mobile devices with Microsoft Intune

segment.target: See Also

segment.target: Common Microsoft Intune evaluation tasks

segment.target: Start a Microsoft Intune trial and deploy iOS PIN policy
